name: Dinesh Kumar Panda
content: The Doc (Ms Kalita) is a deligient psychologist with the right techniques for all mental illness. Today I'm a mentally healthy person and the Doc's contribution in healing my mental disorders (anxiety, stress and self doubts) is beyond explanation. I felt positive changes from our first session itself. Ms Kalita is also LGBTQ+ friendly and understands the severe homophobia induced issues faced by the queer community. Doc Ms. Kalita is one of best persons when it comes to mental health treatment and counseling.

name: Suman Chongder
content: I have been suffering from mental health issues because of my previous setbacks of my past.I have problems like forget things, emotional, disappointed,low confidence, poor memory etc.But mam sessions help me a lot .Now I am a happy person

name: Sonalika Mondal
content: As a mental health professional sheâ€™s really good , well behaved and listens to your problem . She has quite a lot experience i her field to deal with mental health issues ... I wish her all the best for her future endeavours

name: Nirmalya Chakraborty
content: She was very knowledgeable about mental health issues. She was able to explain my condition to me in a way that I could understand.I am grateful for your help mam

name: Spartan
content: Limpee ji was exceptional in helping me pass through my depression phase I think she is the only psychologist in the area who actually listens and helps with utmost care.Mental health can be cured and it's high time we stop treating it as taboo I defeated depression and so can youðŸ˜‡ â€¦

name: Kartick Mondal
content: I was suffering from Obsessive compulsive disorder n It comes to an end when I meet her..limpee mam helped me a lot during this tough time of mine . After few visits to her it turns to a normal... I must recommend to all to visit her if he/she is facing any kind of mental illnesses..Thankyou limpee maam for all efforts u hav made.. Keep going on people needs u a lot.... U r doing a great job.

name: Soumya Hearthorb (Ashirbad Foundation)
content: Very much satisfied one of my cousin brother came out from his depression level... Specially thanks to Limpee mam
